name: Duck Duality
description:
"Doc isn't playing, that mother ducker..."

You are SQU3AKY, the latest advancement in a myriad of really weird projects that could probably end the world if some lunatic came in and abused the technology. Luckily, you got a lunatic to take down that has a robot army and wants to kill you!

He only goes by 'Doc', and he wants to destroy you and research you to end the world! Do you want that to happen? Of course not, you quacking moron!

Take down as many of his robo-goons as you can, but with a twist! You get access to 'Modules' after each room, with each Module giving you powerful buffs but also devastating nerfs! Will you take the risk to swap and experiment, or play without Modules? 

The choice is yours, cyborg ninja rubber ducky! Now go and kick some robot butt!

Controls (Super Duper Important!):

Left-Click : Quack Attack!
Right-Click : Water Pistol! (Shoots at cursor direction)
A/D: Move Left and Right!
W/Space: Jump!
EPIC TIP: Jump off a wall to do a Wall Jump!
E : Interact with Doors (very useful for finishing levels)!
W/D during Room Transitions to go through different selectable Modules!

CREDITS!
bittoboi: Game Design, Colouring, Enemy Art Assets, Level Design
RadiantInferno: Programming (alot of it), Unity Project Management
JewelKnightZero: Environmental Art, Level Design, Sound, Colouring
Nyxi: Game Design, Player Art, Weapon Art, Animations

Audio Provided By https://freesound.org/
Music Provided By Monkey Warhol.
